title: Simplicity Red Team Recruitment LOOKING FOR ADC MAIN PLAT +
body:
This team organisation is a very well structured and serious team we will be competing in next year OOL
Priority Postions
TOP
JG
ADC

ADD: I am Forrest

replies.body:
I play mostly Top and Support and was able to climb to plat 2 on 2 separate accounts (this one and Nelsonas)
I have not been playing for the last 6 months as I recently arrived in Australia (this is why my accounts are gold 1).

I have been looking to play LoL competitively for awhile now, and I know it would not take me much time to return to form. I would be willing to take some time off from Uni/work if the team is able to break into the OPL. The best way to contact me is via email at nicknelson3@gmail.com.

Hello I am an adc main and I would greatly appreciate being on a team. I hope you will atleast consider me even though I have minimum requirements(plat 3). I speak english, I dont troll, positive mentality. :D
Couldn't find your sum. Add me: betterthanjosh

Hey mate
Was wondering if i can get like a position just a sub 
Can play any role
Pref is Top and jungle
Can bite the bullet and play support but i aint a tthresh god XD
just wanting some experience thats all
